title: Rocky
description: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: Network
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

title: All the President's Men
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The story of the two reporters for The Washington Post who uncovered the Watergate scandal, which led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon.

title: Carrie
description: A shy, friendless teenage girl is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother and unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

title: The Omen
description: An American ambassador learns to his horror that his son is actually the Antichrist.

title: Marathon Man
description: A graduate student and obsessive runner in New York is drawn into a murderous web of intrigue involving a Nazi war criminal.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
description: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and is on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

title: King Kong
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Visual Effects
description: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an uncharted island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

title: Logan's Run
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Visual Effects
description: In a futuristic society where citizens are executed at the age of 30, a law enforcement officer goes on the run.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A rock star falls in love with a young singer and helps her find fame, even as his own career is in a downward spiral.

title: The Enforcer
description: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist group made up of militant Vietnam veterans.

title: Silver Streak
description: A man on a cross-country train trip gets entangled in a murder plot.

title: The Bad News Bears
description: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

title: Murder by Death
description: Five famous literary detectives are invited to a remote mansion for a dinner party, where they are challenged to solve a murder.

title: The Shootist
description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

title: Bound for Glory
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score
description: The story of Woody Guthrie, the legendary folk singer who traveled across America during the Great Depression.

title: Assault on Precinct 13
description: An unlikely partnership between a highway patrolman, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles police precinct from a relentless criminal gang.

title: The Man Who Fell to Earth
description: An alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet is corrupted by human society.

title: The Tenant
description: A quiet and unassuming man rents an apartment in Paris and becomes convinced that his neighbors are trying to drive him to suicide.
The story of two men, one a landowner and the other a peasant, who are born on the same day in 1900 and live through the turbulent first half of the 20th century in Italy.

title: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
description: A strip club owner in Los Angeles gets into debt with the mob and is forced to commit a murder to pay it off.

title: The Missouri Breaks
description: A cattle rancher hires a ruthless regulator to hunt down a gang of horse thieves.

title: Family Plot
description: A phony psychic and her private eye boyfriend get mixed up with a pair of professional kidnappers.

title: Bugsy Malone
description: A musical gangster film with an all-child cast.

title: Silent Movie
description: A has-been film director tries to make a comeback by making the first silent movie in 40 years.

title: The Last Tycoon
description: The story of a powerful Hollywood studio executive in the 1930s.

title: The Front
description: During the Hollywood blacklist, a man agrees to be a 'front' for a group of blacklisted writers, but he soon finds himself in over his head.

title: The Seven-Per-Cent Solution
description: Dr. Watson tricks Sherlock Holmes into seeking treatment for his cocaine addiction from Sigmund Freud, and the two great minds team up to solve a case.

title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
description: A young girl living alone in a big house in a small town has a dark secret.

title: Futureworld
description: Two reporters are sent to investigate a new amusement park where the robots have gone haywire.

title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
description: The former Chief Inspector Dreyfus is driven mad by Clouseau's incompetence and threatens to destroy the world with a doomsday machine.

title: The Eagle Has Landed
description: A German commando unit is sent to England to kidnap Winston Churchill.

title: The Cassandra Crossing
description: Passengers on a transcontinental train are infected with a deadly plague.

title: The Gumball Rally
description: A group of people participate in an illegal cross-country road race.

title: Car Wash
description: A day in the life of the employees and customers of a Los Angeles car wash.

title: Obsession
description: A man becomes obsessed with a woman who bears a striking resemblance to his dead wife.

title: Small Change
description: A look at the lives of a group of children in a small French town.

title: Face to Face
description: A psychiatrist has a nervous breakdown and is haunted by disturbing visions.

title: Cria Cuervos
description: A young girl in a dysfunctional family in Madrid retreats into a world of fantasy.

title: The Tenant
description: A quiet and unassuming man rents an apartment in Paris and becomes convinced that his neighbors are trying to drive him to suicide.
